title: >>> HALF TIME
body_text:
"Just very quickly want to point out that six months ago to the date, dodgeball was created. September 3rd, a date I mention quite a bit, began what we all experience now. I would have never guessed making it this far. And just think, it's now March; spring is right around the corner. If dodgeball was this good during these cold months, then who knows what to expect come April, May and so on. Keep your spirits high and your friendships alive: that's the success of dodgeball in one sentence.
I've said it before, and I'm sure I'll say it again, but thank you all for making this an experience of a lifetime. DODGEBALL 30 is coming quickly ... doesn't get much sweeter than that."
September 3rd, 2005 - March 3rd, 2006.
Six Months Ago.
JOHN TRONOLONE
1:03PM
